question: Which Indian wrestler bagged gold in women's 53kg category of the 2019 Poland Open wrestling tournament?
explanation: Star India grappler Vinesh Phogat has bagged gold in women\'s 53kg category of the Poland Open wrestling tournament in Warsaw on 4th August 2019. She prevailed 3-2 over local wrestler Roksana in the final of the competition. This was her third consecutive gold in the 53 kg category after winning Gold at Grand Prix of Spain and at the Yasar Dogu International at Istanbul, Turkey last month.
